title: It’s time for a Sugar Rush!

replies.body:
{{champion:222}} You know why I'm always excited?

{{champion:119}} Nah, why?

{{champion:222}} Because of Sugar Rush!

{{champion:119}} Gee, I'm always hyped because of Blood Rush!

{{champion:222}} We have so much in common!

{{champion:119}} Hahahahahaha!

{{champion:222}} What's so funny?

{{champion:119}} Girly, we have nothing in common. I'm handsome, you're a handful of trouble. I'm famous, you're infamous.

{{champion:222}} So?

{{champion:119}} No one in this world is like me but me.

{{champion:222}} So?

{{champion:119}} ... It means you've got nothing in common with me.

{{champion:222}} So?

{{champion:119}} There's no getting through to you, is there?

{{champion:222}} I'm crazy! I've got a doctor's note.
